content: To protect the portal against brute-force attacks, you can set up the limits of unsuccessful login attempts by the user.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the protection mechanism against brute-force attacks on mobile devices. It helps users understand how to set limits on unsuccessful login attempts made by a user.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'الاختراق' (al-ikhtiraq) primarily means 'hacking' or 'breach,' not 'brute-force attack'. The English phrase 'brute-force attacks' refers to repeated attempts to guess a password or gain unauthorized access through repeated trials.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لحماية البوابة من هجمات القوة الغاشمة (li-himāyat al-bawwātu min hajamāt al-quwwa al-ghāshima) or لحماية البوابة من محاولات تخريب (li-himāyat al-bawwātu min muḥāwalāt takhrīb).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation could benefit from a slightly more natural flow. The phrasing is a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لحماية البوابة، يمكنك تحديد عدد محاولات تسجيل الدخول الفاشلة للمستخدم.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kobud güc hücumlarından" (rough force attacks) is a less precise translation of "brute-force attacks". A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "kütləvi güc hücumlarından" (mass force attacks) or "təkrar güc hücumlarından" (repeated force attacks).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Portalı təkrar güc hücumlarından/kütləvi güc hücumlarından qorumaq üçün...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ze strany uživatele" (by the user) is somewhat awkward and verbose in this context. It's more natural to simply say 'uživatele'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chcete-li portál chránit před útoky hrubou silou, můžete nastavit limity neúspěšných pokusů o přihlášení uživatele.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'unsuccessful login attempts' is translated as 'Anzahl der erfolglosen Anmeldeversuche' which literally translates to 'number of unsuccessful login attempts'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in German would be 'maximal erlaubte Anzahl erfolgloser Anmeldeversuche' or similar, to emphasize a limit.
The translation 'ブルートフォース攻撃からポータルを保護するために' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. A more idiomatic translation would focus on protecting the portal *from* brute-force attacks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ポータルをブルートフォース攻撃から保護するために

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '失敗したログイン試行の制限を設定することができます' is grammatically correct but reads a bit formal. It could be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ユーザのログイン試行回数制限を設定できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ການໂຈມຕີໂດຍບັງເອີນ' (kaan joom tii dooi bang-een) translates to 'accidental attacks' or 'random attacks'. The English 'brute-force attacks' implies a systematic and repeated attempt, which isn't conveyed accurately. A more accurate translation would focus on repeated or forceful attempts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ພະຍາຍາມບັງຄັບເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ (pa-yaam bang-khap khao suu ra-bop)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບທີ່ບໍ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ' (khwaam pa-yaam khao suu ra-bop thii bo prii sop phon sam-ret) is a bit clunky. While grammatically correct, it can be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບທີ່ບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ (kaan khao suu ra-bop thii bo thiik thong)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "දොරව රැක ගැනීමට" (dorawa rakagetuwva getu) literally translates to 'to protect the door,' but in context, it should refer to protecting the 'portal' or 'system'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බෲට් ෆෝර්ස් ප්‍රහාර වලින් පද්ධතිය රැක ගැනීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'වාර ගණන' (vaara ganaa) translates to 'number of times'. While technically correct, it could be phrased more naturally in Sinhala to convey 'attempts'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයාට උත්සාහ කළ හැකි වාර ගණන සීමා කිරීමට හැකිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow. Combining the first and second parts of the translation might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බෲට් ෆෝර්ස් ප්‍රහාර වලින් පද්ධතිය රැක ගැනීම සඳහා, පරිශ්‍රීලකයාට උත්සාහ කළ හැකි වාර ගණන සීමා කිරීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'brute-force attacks' is translated as 'napadi z vdorom'. While technically correct, a more common and understandable translation for this context would be 'silovit napad' or 'brutalne napade'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Za zaščito portala pred silovitimi napadi lahko nastavite omejitve uporabnikovih neuspešnih poskusov prijave.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'brute-force' is commonly used as is in Serbian IT contexts. Translating it as 'напада brute-force' doesn't flow naturally and might confuse users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да бисте заштитили портал од brute-force напада, можете поставити ограничења неуспешних покушаја пријављивања од стране корисника.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the translation uses a comma after 'напада' which can improve readability in this specific context. Serbian often prefers a full stop in such sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да бисте заштитили портал од brute-force напада. Можете поставити ограничења неуспешних покушаја пријављивања од стране корисника.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'unsuccessful login attempts' is translated as 'başarısız oturum açma girişimlerinin'. While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing in Turkish would be 'yanlış oturum açma denemelerinin' or 'hatalı oturum açma girişimlerinin'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Portalı brute force saldırılarına karşı korumak için kullanıcının yanlış oturum açma denemelerinin sayısını sınırlayabilirsiniz.
